ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 1 |  | #P_qsscn | |- QQ C_ CC |

| 3 |  | #P_1z | |- 1 e. ZZ |

| 7 | 1, 2, 5, 6 | #P_expcl2lem | |- ( ( A e. QQ /\ A =/= 0 /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( A ^ N ) e. QQ ) |
